I'm Josh Martin

I am a Designer, Illustrator, and Front-End Developer from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania living in Chicago, Illinois.

I currently work as the Creative Director for Threadmeup.

About

My expertise is in designing for large-scale web and mobile products. My experience thus far has been working with internet news media and e-commerce platforms.

I focus on UI/UX Design, Front-End Development, Rapid Prototyping, Branding/Identity, and Illustration.
